name: Desert
interpretation:
Encountering the desert in dreams or visions may signal a call to explore purifying solitude and visionary emptiness. Jung might see the desert as connecting us to natural wisdom, while Hillman could explore its role in re-enchanting our relationship with the living world. Mythologically, the desert appears across cultures as a symbol of solitude, purification. Esoteric traditions might frame it as a key to understanding purifying solitude and visionary emptiness. If the desert appears in your experience, consider what aspects of purifying solitude and visionary emptiness are seeking attention in your life.

— Inspired by Jung, Hillman, Campbell, Grof, ARAS, and archetypal wisdom traditions.
